original_text: And he shall bring his trespass offering unto the Lord, unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, even a ram for a trespass offering.
korean_text: 그 남자는 그 속건제물 곧 속건제 숫양을 회막 문 여호와께로 끌고 올 것이요

sentences.original_text: And he shall bring his trespass offering unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 범과제물을 주께 가져올 것이라

sentences.original_text: unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation
even a ram for a trespass offering
